glosses: To put one's foot in one's mouth, to make a gaffe, to blunder.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish پوت قیرمق (pot ḳırmaḳ, “to fold in plaits, to blurt out an unwelcome and untimely speech”), equivalent to compound of pot (“a wrinkle or crease due to faulty stitching; a blunder”) + kırmak (“to break, to fold”).
